document_data.name: Kherris
document_data.mainbody: '''Kherris''' was a [[Lords of Waterdeep|Masked Lord]] of [[Waterdeep]]. In [[1037 DR]], creatures from another plane spread out of [[Undermountain]] into Waterdeep, and assisted by [[Ahghairon]], Kherris used the [[axe]] ''[[Azuredge]]'' to turn them back.
